sense.gloss: to be shut, to close, to be closed
to be firm (of a body, face, etc.), to be well-knit
to become sober, to become tense

sdata.j: ↑不正↑↓ふせい↓アクセスは、↑法律↑↓ほうりつ↓で↑取↑↓と↓り|↑締↑↓し↓まる|べき。
sdata.e: There should be a law against computer hacking.

sdata.j: ↑暴力↑↓ぼうりょく↓を↑取↑↓と↓り|↑締↑↓し↓まる|のは、↑政府↑↓せいふ↓の↑責任↑↓せきにん↓である。
sdata.e: It is up to the government to take action on violence.
